techmeme.title: Sources: Tim Cook approved doubling Apple's AI chips budget in 2023 after John Giannandrea sought more GPUs, but CFO Luca Maestri cut the increase to under half (Tripp Mickle/New York Times)
Madrid-based Jobandtalent, which connects gig workers with companies, raised a $103M Series F at a $1.5B valuation, down from its $500M Series E at $2.35B (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Bermuda-based Meanwhile, which offers life insurance to US citizens with BTC holdings, raised a $40M Series A led by Framework and Fulgur at a $190M valuation (Catherine McGrath/Fortune)
American small-business owners who source goods from overseas, especially from China, and sell them online, face acute uncertainty about the tariffs' impact (Caroline O'Donovan/Washington Post)
EC president von der Leyen: the EU may tax Big Tech ad revenue, targeting Meta and Google, if Trump trade talks fail and won't revisit its "untouchable" rules (Financial Times)
